description:
The perfect Williamsburg location! Our top floor south Williamsburg apt is extremely charming and amazing with all the amenities you could want. Queen bed, oversized couch, appleTV, playstation, Keurig stocked with coffee and hot chocolate.

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. 

The apartment is close to the JMZ subway, Peter Luger Steak House, Baby's All Right, Pies 'n' Thighs, Marlow & Sons, Giando on the Water, Freehold and Lucky Dog.

The MTA Subway - Marcy Ave (J/M/Z) - Williamsburg- is a 2min walk away!

Bedford Ave L - is about 12min walk away!
name: Charming Williamsburg Spot - 10 mins to the City!
review: The host canceled this reservation 50 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
